professional_summary: Multidisciplinary Mechanical engineer with 2+ years of professional experience in mechanical, robotics, automation, and full-stack development. Proven expertise in establishing lithium battery production lines, automating manufacturing processes, and delivering product solutions from design to deployment by meeting industrial standards.

Improved reliability via glovebox, argon dryer designs and Jigs/Fixtures
Organized workshops and demos, improving innovation culture
Improved administration and event executionfor the welfare of 500+ underprivileged children
